channel.code:
hush();
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(1);

var b = 0; 
update = () => b = (0.4* a.fft[5]);
speed = 1;

shape(20,0.2,0.3)
.color(0.5,0.8,50)
  .scale(() => b +1*2)
  .repeat(() =>b*10)  
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => b +0.5)
  .modulate(noise(2,2))
  .rotate(1, .2)
  // .invert(2.4)
.out(o1)


shape(20,0.2,0.3)
.color(0.5,0.8,50)
  .scale(() => b +1*2)
  .repeat(() =>b*10)
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => b +0.5)
  .modulate(noise(2,2))
  .rotate(-1, .2)
  .invert(2.4)
.out(o2)

src(o2).diff(o1,10).out(o0)
channel.name: onde a bolle
streamdicolori
bitmap
snow glitch

channel.code:
hush()
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(3); 
a.setSmooth(0.9);
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[2]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2])/10; //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[5]);  //uno meno 0.0
}

//prima source
noise(1, .2).scale(()=>c)
  .rotate(()=>(c*10)%360,0.3)
  .layer(src(o0).scrollX(.2))
  .out(o2);
src(o0)
 .saturate(1)
 .scale(()=>f)
 .color((()=>1.01+c),(()=>1.01+c),(()=>1.01+c))
 .hue(()=>time/60000+c)
 .modulateHue(src(o0).hue(.003).posterize(-1).contrast(.7)
  .rotate(()=>c,2),()=>d)
  .layer( src(o2) .luma() .mult(gradient(()=>c).saturate(()=>b))  )
  .out(o0)


src(o1)
  .modulate(
  	noise(()=>b+3).rotate(b%360,1)
  ,0.005) 
  .blend(shape(4),0.01) 
  .out(o1)  
;
src(o3).modulate(src(o0),0.005).blend(shape(4).layer(src(o0)),()=>b/10).out(o3) 
render(o3);
channel.name: quadrato strano
red primordiales
rombi colorati

channel.code:
hush()
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(3);
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[5]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2]); //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[5]);  //uno meno 0.0
}

osc(0.5,1.25).mult(shape(1,0.09).rotate(1.5))
  .diff(gradient(Math.sin(time))).scrollX(()=>c)
  .add(shape(()=>f+1,2)
       .blend(gradient([1,2,4].smooth(()=>c))))
  .modulate(noise()
            .modulate(noise(()=>9+b).scrollY(1,0.0625)))
  .blend(o0).contrast( 0.5)
  .color(0.9,0,3)
  .out()

channel.code:
hush()
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setScale(0.7);
a.setCutoff(2.5); 
a.setSmooth(0.9)
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[5]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2]); //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[3]);  //uno meno 0.0
}


osc(13,0,1)
  .kaleid()
  .mask(shape(()=>b+2,c,1))
  .modulateRotate(shape(()=>b+2,0.2,1))
  .modulateRotate(src(o0))
  .modulateRotate(src(o0))
  .scale(()=>f)
  .add(shape(()=>b+2,0.2,1).color(0.3,1,1,0.5))
  .rotate(()=>time) 
  .out(o0)

render(o0)

tool artwork

sinestesia paranoica

channel.code:
hush();
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(1);
a.setScale(0.7);
a.setSmooth(0.8);
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[5]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2]); //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[5]);  //uno meno 0.0
}

shape(20,0.1,0.01)
  .scale(() => Math.sin(time)*3)
  .repeat(() => Math.sin(time)*10)
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => Math.sin(time)*2)
  .modulate(noise(2,0))
  .rotate(()=>a.vol/1000, ()=>a.vol/1000)
.out(o0)


src(o1)
.modulateKaleid(voronoi(() => Math.sin(time)*3,0.1,0.01),() => Math.sin(time)*3)
.scale(() => a.vol/10)
.out(o2)

src(o0)
.modulate(osc(500,0,0))
.out(o1)
render(o2)

channel.code:
hush();
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(1);
a.setSmooth(0.8);
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[5]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2]); //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[5]);  //uno meno 0.0
}

 setFunction({
 name: 'palet', type: 'src',
   inputs:[
 {type: 'float',name: 'freq',default: 0.5},
 {type: 'float',name: 'frac',default: 0.5},
 {type: 'float',name: 'sat', default: 50.0,}],
    glsl:
'float pi = 3.14159265359;'+
'vec2 st = _st * 2. - 1.;'+
'vec2 st0 = st;'+
 
'vec3 finalColor = vec3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);'+
'vec3 col = vec3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);'+
'float t = length(st0)+time*freq;'+
'vec3 a = vec3(0.5, 0.0, 0.5);'+
'vec3 b = vec3(0.5, 0.5, 0.5);'+
'vec3 c = vec3(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);'+
'vec3 de = vec3(0.263, 0.416, 0.557);'+
    'col = a + b*tan(2.*pi*(c*t+de));'+
 
 'for (float i = 0.0; i < 3.; i++) {'+
     'st = fract(st*frac)-0.5;'+
'float d = abs(length(st)*log(length(st0)));'+
      'd = sin(d*2.*pi+time)/sat;'+
      'd = 0.02 / d;'+
'finalColor += col * d;}'+
'return vec4(finalColor,1.0);'})
 
palet(0.2,2.,10.).out(o0);
channel.name: void
void
